@CryptoPietje Then I compute sha256(sha256(m)) =
23401742317f57f21d603bf7ba0a0e5780f8143aa9b2ccafc4f61af0e8dda294

@CryptoPietje Then I concatenate K to this:
m = 63727970746F706965746A6550d858e0985ecc7f606571983a8914d9820b0e7a5b48dce06abcff6f71620958
@CryptoPietje I then convert your handle to lowercase, "cryptopietje" and use the UTF-8 encoding, which in hex is 63727970746F706965746A65

@CryptoPietje K is the bitwise xor of s and t.
K = s xor t = 50d858e0985ecc7f606571983a8914d9820b0e7a5b48dce06abcff6f71620958
